name: history-explorer-card
description: A card for Home Assistant Lovelace for exploring the history of your entities interactively and in real time.
author: JC <joshua@coales.co.uk>

scripts.postversion: sed -i "s/^const Version = '[^']*';/const Version = '$npm_package_version';/" src/history-explorer-card.js && yarn build && git add history-explorer-card.js src/history-explorer-card.js
